The claim is supported by the CEO and pr: Maria Teresa Kumar, who stated on NBC's Meet the Press that undocumented immigrants pay $12 billion in taxes every year.
The claim is further backed by a note is: which states that undocumented immigrants and their employers contributed about $13 billion in payroll taxes in 2010.
The Social Security Administration estim: 1 million unauthorized immigrants worked and paid Social Security taxes in 2010, supporting the claim that undocumented immigrants contribute to tax revenue.
The: 12 billion contribution by undocumented immigrants to taxes was affirmed by the Social Security Administration's chief actuary, Stephen C. Goss, in a 2014 Vice News piece.
